components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,FUEL SYSTEM, GASOLINE
summary: THE IDLE SPEED CONTROL VALVE WAS REPLACED BECAUSE THE VEHICLE HAD DIFFICULTIES STARTING.  THE PROBLEM STILL OCCURRED AND WAS REPLACED 7 MORE TIMES.  THE CONSUMER FOUND INFORMATION ON A TOYOTA REPORT WHICH INDICATED THAT THE EGR VALVE AND THE FUEL PRESSURE REGULATOR WERE PREVENTING THE VEHICLE FROM STARTING.   *SCC   *NLM
